statements: DELETE FROM customer_financial_data WHERE customer_id = 123 AND email LIKE '%@example.com'
DELETE FROM customer_financial_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
DELETE FROM customer_financial_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT customer_id FROM financial_data WHERE customers.customer_id = financial_data.customer_id)
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM financial_data WHERE balance <= 1000)
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM accounts);
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE account_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM Accounts WHERE customer_id = 123456);
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score < 500);
DELETE FROM Accounts WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers);
